pageContent: Background: We systematically evaluated the evidences on oncological and functional outcomes of high-intensity focused ultrasound (HIFU) as the primary treatment for localized prostate cancer (PCa).

metaData.source:
High-intensity focused ultrasound and cryotherapy as salvage treatment in local radio-recurrent prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/22797110/
